argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subgoinv.1 | |- W = ran H |
| 2 |  | subgoinv.2 | |- M = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | subgoinv.3 | |- N = ( inv ` H ) |
| 4 |  | #P_issubgo | |- ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) <-> ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ H C_ G ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simp2bi | |- ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) -> H e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` H ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 3 | #P_grporinv | |- ( ( H e. GrpOp /\ A e. W ) -> ( A H ( N ` A ) ) = ( GId ` H ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( A H ( N ` A ) ) = ( GId ` H ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> A e. W ) |
| 11 | 1, 3 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( H e. GrpOp /\ A e. W ) -> ( N ` A ) e. W ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( N ` A ) e. W ) |
| 13 | 1 | #P_subgoov | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ ( A e. W /\ ( N ` A ) e. W ) ) -> ( A H ( N ` A ) ) = ( A G ( N ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 10, 12, 13 | #P_syl12anc | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( A H ( N ` A ) ) = ( A G ( N ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 16 | 15, 6 | #P_subgoid | |- ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) -> ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 14, 17 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 19 | 4 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran G = ran G |
| 22 | 21, 1 | #P_subgornss | |- ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) -> W C_ ran G ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> A e. ran G ) |
| 24 | 22 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> W C_ ran G ) |
| 25 | 24, 12 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( N ` A ) e. ran G ) |
| 26 | 21, 15, 2 | #P_grpoinvid1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. ran G /\ ( N ` A ) e. ran G ) -> ( ( M ` A ) = ( N ` A ) <-> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 27 | 20, 23, 25, 26 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( ( M ` A ) = ( N ` A ) <-> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 28 | 18, 27 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( M ` A ) = ( N ` A ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( H e. ( SubGrpOp ` G ) /\ A e. W ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( M ` A ) ) |
